column5: Managed to pick up this little girl the other day for a loonie sleeps 8 is very sound fridge stove washroom all equipment and electronics I have used it a few times during the last 2 years we shall see how it goes I have aready mounted the down rigger plates for next year for the rough days i cant get its little brother out. Im kinda leary if you own a larger boat you will understand this  Bring On Another Thousand Peter
I hear the cash register singing now....
How much did it cost to install that antenna? Must have set you back a few more loonies!
Wow!  Sweet ride Peter!  May cost you intially, but just keep telling yourself it's an investment....LOL.
right now the intent is to use it as a floating cottage that moves
That looks like a great deal Peter.  I think it would be fun to get it all fixed up.  Take pics of your progress okay  Joey
Congrats! What is it 25' or so?

The weather started getting rough... the tiny ship was tossed... if not for the courage of the fearless crew... their cookies would be tossed... their cookies would be tossed....    Have FUN with it Peter.... I'm sure the family will enjoy it immensely !
